name: Book Marketing,Internet Marketing Expert, Social Media Marketing
seeking: This book marketing and social media marketing expert would benefit from partnerships with self-publishing platforms, literary agents, and independent authors who need promotional support to launch and scale book sales. Joint ventures with podcast booking agencies, virtual event hosts, or speaking bureaus would allow co-packaging of book promotion with media visibility. Collaborations with business coaches or online course creators who want to use books as lead generation tools would also be a strong fit.
who_you_serve: Authors and established business owners seeking book marketing, internet marketing, and social media strategies to amplify their visibility and sales.
what_you_do: Delivers comprehensive book marketing, internet marketing expertise, and social media strategies for established businesses.
offering: Book marketing, internet marketing strategy, and social media marketing campaigns
business_focus: Delivers comprehensive book marketing, internet marketing expertise, and social media strategies for established businesses.
